title: Restaurants I like
description: A list of some of my favorite places to get a meal in the Seattle area.
html:
There are many great restaurants in the Seattle area. These are some of the ones I enjoy.

Restaurant Type of food Price Location Highlights
Afghan Cuisine Afghan $$ Overlake Qabili pallow
Altura Italian, fine dining $$$$$ Capital Hill Omakase
Blu Sardinia Italian $$ Redmond Braised beef ravioli
Bottle and Bull Tapas, cocktails $$$$ Kirkland Cocktails
Carello Italian $$$$ Capital Hill Small bites cart
Castilla Spanish $$$ Bellevue Squid ink paella
Communion Southern $$$ Central District The Southern dishes
Dacha Diner Georgian $$ Capital Hill Khachapuri
Dong Ting Chun Chinese $$ Redmond Pork belly bao
Dreamland Bar American Brunch $$ Fremont Disco ball hallway
Facing East Taiwanese $$ Bellevue Pork belly
